about_description: To contact us, you can write directly from the form below or use other means of communication.
about_full: Our team has more than 20 years of professional experience in this field. We used to be buyers and later we worked as sellers in this field. We provide sales of spare parts for various brands and brands. The problems we faced both when we were sellers and when we were buyers forced us to take another step forward. In 2018, together with our team, we started to develop a digital project on a more convenient way for buyers and sellers, and Beta versions of the web platform and mobile application called "Otobaza" are already operational.
project_vision_text:
Buyers have always been concerned about how accurate the price is and why not in the store he went to or problems where there may be.

What worries sellers is why buyers don't apply when I have a spare part and the price is right.

Since we are experiencing both of these situations, we are offering this site to you this year, thinking that it will benefit both sellers and buyers. Our goal is to offer buyers the spare parts they are looking for at a more affordable price and at a wider list. The aim is to increase the customer base of sellers.

items.title: Registration
items.desc: Register by entering your personal information and add your car to your personal garage.

items.title: Finding a spare part
items.desc: Find the spare parts you need for your car and choose the product according to the price and short distance from the list provided.

items.title: Purchase of spare parts
items.desc: Entering the selected product, obtaining detailed information about the Seller and ordering (purchasing) the product.

sellers.title: SELLERS
sellers.desc: You can order spare parts by contacting. You can repeat the step for other spare parts.

items.title: Registration
items.desc: Register by entering store information and creating a store.

items.title: Spare Parts Placement
items.desc: To download a list of spare parts in bulk or retail, download the sample EXCELL file and load it into the system.

items.title: Payment
items.desc: Select the required package according to the number of spare parts and pay for the number of clicks.

tariffs_desc: You can continue your sales by choosing the PACKAGE that suits you.

plans.title: Profitability
plans.desc: If you are a seller, you can sell more and earn more at less costs. The more products you add, the more chances you have to sell.

plans.title: Save time
plans.desc: For the seller - save time spent looking for a customer. For the buyer - to get offers from a more diverse and close to you place without wasting time traveling.

plans.title: Variety width
plans.desc: A wider price comparison of the spare part you are looking for.

plans.title: Price differences
plans.desc: A wider price comparison of the spare part you are looking for

plans.title: Chance to be a Seller
plans.desc: Everyone has a chance to become a Seller and make a profit.

plans.title: Convenience of the system
plans.desc: Get the information you need simply by selecting your car or typing in the detail code.

faq_desc: To contact us, you can write directly from the form below or use other means of communication.
how_work_dec:
Our goal is to provide you with the correct price and information from the nearest sellers.

You will be provided with a complete list of OEM, cross, duplicates and additional products that you are looking for, including the make, model or product code of your car.
drivers_desc: If you need spare parts for your car, you can contact Otobaza
otobaza_desc: You can find the necessary spare parts for your car and click on it to get contact information about the Sellers selling this product.
success_email: Your email address has been confirmed!
success_email_desc: Your account email address has been verified.
store_info_text: Attention! The Seller warrants the availability of this spare part and the price indicated on it. If the price and availability do not match, please let us know. OTOBAZA is not responsible for the accuracy of the information provided by the seller. We recommend that you read the terms of use.
